description: Advanced study and research in nursing leading to the completion of the dissertation proposal.
name: DISSERTATION SEMINAR I

values.comments:
This course involves advanced study and research in nursing leading to the completion of the dissertation proposal.

Students generally described this course as “tough” but a “great course” for learning how to write a proposal. Some students felt that the course was disorganized and lacked focus on scholarly critique skills.

Most students appreciated the support of the faculty throughout this course. However, some students recognized that the faculty was busy with grant writing. Many students would have liked more critical analysis and guided directions on their drafts.

This course is for doctoral students in nursing. This class should be preceded by all the core courses in nursing.
